text: "Guess what? You're going to wake up tomorrow and have an absolutely phenomenal day. And if your day isn't phenomenal, it'll still be better than today."
author: Celine "starsmitten" Cheung

text: "The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff. We are a way for the universe to know itself."
author: Carl Sagan

text: "The difference between screwing around and science is writing it down."
author: Adam Savage

text: "You can often view glimpses of ingeniousness not as inexplicable miracles, but as the residue of experience; and when you do, the idea of genius goes from being mesmerizing to instead being actively inspirational."
author: Grant "3Blue1Brown" Sanderson

text: "Don't live someone else's version of life perfectly, live your own version of life imperfectly."
author: Steve Jobs

text: this is a template, it'll never appear on the page
author: N/A
